import math
def sumof(n):
	sq,su=int(math.sqrt(n)),0
	for i in xrange (2,sq+1):
		if n%i==0:
			su+=i+((n/i) if i*i!=n else 0)
		else:
			continue
	return su+1
t=int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(t):
	n=int(raw_input())
	s1=sumof(n)
	s2=sumof(s1)
	if s2==n:
		print 'Yes, amicable with %d' %s1
	else:
		print 'No'
